item.description:
The Ladies Home Club invites you to a Pre Rosh Hashanah Ladies’ Night Out, with Joanne Caras, author of the highly-acclaimed Holocaust Survivor cook book.
Hear the amazing events that led her to create this soul stirring legacy, of family and food. Sandy Weitz will tell us about a great program entitled "Legacy Partners".
Savor some of the finest delicacies from the cookbook while enjoying a flavored coffee bar. Cookbooks will be on sale as well. Book signing to follow.
Fee: 10$
Location: Chabad of Peabody 83 Pine st unit #E
RSVP online at http://www.jewishpeabody.com/templates/articlecco_cdo/aid/1591550/jewish/Survivors-Cookbook-Event.htm
Or
RSVP: 978 977 9111 or email raizel@jewishpeabody.com
item.name: Ladies Home Club - Kick-off event
